NO_SPECIAL_CHARS: Code must not contain special characters like & * $ # ( ) @ ! ~ + etc.
IS_EMAIL: {property} Please enter a valid email address.
IS_BOOLEAN: This field must be true or false.
ARRAY_NOT_EMPTY: {property} must not be an empty array.
YEAR_MUST_BE_CURRENT_OR_NEXT: {property} must be this year or next year.
